pes.name: Ohromnej pes
pes.onwalk: controller.clear();controller.question('combat', 'FIGHT WITH DOG HAS BEGUN! Do you want to win?', [{command: 'yes', callback: function() {controller.log('What a glorious victory!');}}, {command: 'no', callback: function() {controller.log('Rekt!');}}]);render.switchTab('console');

apple.onuse: game.inventory.add('apple');controller.log('I have opened the apple and there are another two apples inside!');
